caption.p: Overview of the 5 steps for dental management of geriatric patients in the wake of COVID‐19

tr.td: Documenting personal details and chief complaint
Recording Dental, Medical and Drug History
Evaluation for specific clinical manifestations of SARS‐CoV‐2 Infection
Treatment Planning based on the chief complaint and urgency
Recommendations—before, during and after dental treatment

fn.p: Steps 1‐4 to be performed through telephone/video conferencing and then verified on arrival at the clinic
